import React from 'react' import { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import FeedbackContext from '../context/FeedbackContext' function RatingSelect({select}) { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(4) const handleChange = (e) => { setSelected(+e.currentTarget.value) select(+e.currentTarget.value) } const { feedbackEdit } = useContext(FeedbackContext) useEffect(() => { setSelected(1) }, [feedbackEdit]) return (
) } export default RatingSelect
